about_the_game:
Story

October 4, 2022
The first missiles hit Germany after an unresolved conflict between world powers. Ted Williams, one of the only survivors of the disaster, barely manages to find shelter in a school bunker.

3 years later:
Food supplies are running out. Ted Williams, who is now mentally ill, has to escape the bunker. However, he previously locked himself in the bunker for his own protection and developed puzzles so that he would not be tempted to leave the bunker too early. Now he has to overcome these puzzles and obstacles in order to leave the bunker again after years.

This is his last chance to survive... Even in the uncertainty of whether humanity has survived.

What awaits you in the game...


Six tricky puzzles and codes:

Your determination and cleverness will be tested as you fight your way through six exciting puzzles. Find hidden clues, decipher codes and use your knowledge to find your way out. Every puzzle solved brings you one step closer to freedom.

Important information at a glance:

Name: Desperate ESCAPE
Location: school bunker
Puzzle: Six challenges that must be solved
Objective: Escape the bunker and return to the surface
Duration: 30 minutes (depending on speed)

Are you ready to take on the challenge of “Desperate ESCAPE”?

name: Desperate ESCAPE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200U 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Ted Williams, who has been sheltering in a school bunker for three years after a rocket attack, now has to escape due to a lack of food supplies. To do this, he has to solve his self-constructed puzzles and obstacles that were supposed to prevent him from escaping the bunker.
